title: 114_hr3042
content: Stop Tobacco Sales to Youth Act of 2015 Amends the Jenkins Act to include within the definition of quot, cigarettequot, electronic cigarettes, cigars, and pipe tobacco. Defines quot, electronic cigarettequot. To mean any electronic device that delivers nicotine, flavor, or other substance via an aerosolized solution to the user inhaling from the device, excluding any product that: (1) is approved by the Food and Drug Administration for sale as a tobacco cessation product or for another therapeutic purpose, and (2) is marketed and sold solely for such a therapeutic purpose. Makes specified exceptions with respect to Indian tribes and tribal matters.
